artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded black and white music sheet with the score on the recto and verso; from fashion periodical (P.15,457) that includes a folded hand-colored engraving of two women in fashionable period dress (P.15,455-P.15,456)
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Musical score from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Second Cahier, 5 Mars 1790
